Description of incident: From approximately January 30, 2018, through February 6, 2018, an unknown person, without authorization, had access to the business email account of a Trimont employee. Trimont first learned that the account was potentially compromised on February 6, 2018, and immediately terminated the intruder's access to the email account and launched an investigation. The investigation has determined that the compromise began with a phishing email sent by the unknown person to the employee on January 30, 2018.
